Detailed Description

Human player.

Implements interface ChPlayer. In addition to that interface provides the following methods to support interaction with user:

  • setValidator() allows to specify validator of moves.
  • onSquareClicked() slot may be connected to the signal that informs about user clicks on board.

Parameters:
boardData - reference to board data.

Implements ChPlayer.

void ChHumanPlayer::startMove (  )  [virtual]

Called to inform Player that it is time to perform move.

When move is ready then the signal moved() should be emitted by the Player.

Implements ChPlayer.

void ChHumanPlayer::stopMove (  )  [virtual]

Called to inform Player that it should stop thinking about move.

After stopMove() call the Player should not emit selectionChanged() and moved() signals.

Implements ChPlayer.

Sets validator to use in possible moves selection.

validator - validator.

void ChHumanPlayer::onSquareClicked ( int  index,
int  selected,
const ChSquares &  highlighted 
) [slot]

Processes user clicks on board.

Deselects selected square if it is clicked againe or if click is performed outside of possible move squares.

Selects new piece if index contains piece of the same color as Player.

Performs move (emits moved() signal) if index is a possible move square.

Updates selection information (emits selectionChanged() signal).

Parameters:
index - clicked square.
selected - square with item to move or -1.
highlighted - list of possible target squares for move from selected square.
